snippet: The Capitals’ Mike Green scored only three goals in the regular season, but he delivered the decisive score against the Rangers in Game 4.
abstract: Washington Capitals defenseman Mike Green scores the winning goal in Game 4 playoff victory over New York Rangers.
lead_paragraph: The Capitals’ Mike Green scored only three goals in the regular season, but he delivered the decisive score against the Rangers in Game 4.

headline.seo: Defenseman Mike Green Scores Winning Goal for Capitals
headline.main: Putting Injuries in His Past, Defenseman Moves Forward With the Winning Goal
headline.print_headline: Putting Injuries in His Past, Defenseman Moves Forward With the Winning Goal
